translations.You created two-factor backup codes for: Umeunda misimbo ya usaidizi ya vipengele viwili vya akaunti yako
translations.Second-factor backup codes: Misimbo ya ambari mbadala za kipengele cha pili
translations.You enabled two-factor authentication bu: Umewasha uthibitishaji wa vipengele viwili lakini bado hukutoa misimbo mbadala. Inahitajika ili kurejesha ufikiaji wa akaunti yako endapo utapoteza kipengele chako cha pili.
translations.A two-factor auth backup codes provider: Mtoa huduma wa misimbo ya uthibitishaji wa vipengele viwili
translations.An error occurred while generating your: Hitilafu ilitokea wakati wa kuunda misimbo yako mbadala
translations.Backup codes have been generated. {used}: Misimbo ya hifadhi rudufu imetolewa. {used}kati ya misimbo {total} zimetumika.
translations.These are your backup codes. Please save: Hii ndiyo misimbo yako mbadala. Tafadhali ihifadhi na/au uichapishe kwani hutaweza kusoma misimbo tena baadaye.
translations.Regenerate backup codes: Tengeneza upya misimbo mbadala ya usaidizi
translations.If you regenerate backup codes, you auto: Ukiunda upya misimbo mbadala, unabatilisha misimbo ya zamani kiotomatiki.
translations.Use one of the backup codes you saved wh: Tumia mojawapo ya misimbo mbadala uliyohifadhi wakati wa kusanidi uthibitishaji wa vipengele viwili.
